K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-0: @364a *// panytsa ta th'a ga ta mam ga la g'a th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-3: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-4: rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-5: zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-6: dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-7: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-8: mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid pa'i gti mug rnam sbyong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-9: mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-10: dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-11: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-12: sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-13: yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi slu ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-14: rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-15: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-16: bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-17: ye shes padmo'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-18: tshe grangs med par byin gyis rlob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-19: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-20: sems can don gyi las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-21: 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364a-22: thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364b-0: @364b bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-069:364b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so ////
